item.title: Cloudron Projects
item.description: This is a list of Cloudron Apps I maintain. These are not affiliated with Cloudron. However I use them myself so at the very least they work. I cannot guarantee the security of these apps either. If you notice any issues with the below, please open an issue on their respective GitHub links. List of available projects Cloudron Visual Studio Code Option Value Description Visual Studio Code as a webapp.

item.title: Exchange Mailbox Export
item.description: Project Page After much searching around and trying to get 2013 / 2016 exchange to properly export to PST any mailbox and items that included my search terms. On the project page you will find a PowerShell script that is easily configurable. This script will allow you to specify user mailbox’s to search, where to put the found items, and where to export the new PST to. The PST will contain the emails, in a folder, for each mailbox.
